name: GodoRogue
description:
Traditional roguelike 80s style! Survive till depth 26, get the amulet and escape alive! Ascii and reto classic game.

Executable/binary version works better than the Web/HTML

  • User arrows or numpad to move and attack
  • Press F1 or H to read help
  • Seriusly, press F1/H or you wont be able to play this game
  • Hold Ctrl while moving over green floor to auto-run (easy for backtracking)
  • It's a traditional roguelike: easy to play but hard to master

You need to go down at depth 26, collect the Amulet of Yendor and escape up to floor 1. Every item can be good or cursed. Everything is random (An orange potion of Healing can be an orange potion of Poison next game).

I didn't managed to won on my own game. My record is depth 20 and killed by a Medusa. It's possible to win. Magic wands are powerful
